title: I'm noob help
body: Ok guys so I may sound stupid but, I've just finished a game, got S on Cait and at the end of the match popped up something, i recieved a chest from Riot,(not a Hextech chest, it was a kinda golden one) and I didn't quite pay attention to it because I badly wanted to see how much damage I dealt, and I thought I would find it in my loot, but no. So any1 can explain me what's that chest or give me a link to some tricky chesty tutorial dunno?

replies.body:
I checked your account out and it seems this was the notification from us delivering your **Poro King Summoner Icon**! :)

If you have any other questions, let me know.
